evidence.claim: Arrow Senior Concierge utilizes AWS services for their cloud infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations, indicating a focus on secure handling of health-related information.
Integration with EHRs through X12 transaction sets is mentioned in their service descriptions.
References to FHIR standards for data exchange were found in their technical resources.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of sending/receiving X12 transactions or API automation for healthcare data exchange.
